title: we are breeding ssh control path processes which persist for days

labels.name: severity-important
labels.description: major effect on the usability of a package, without rendering it completely unusable to everyone

my believe that they are all produced by datalad 0.14.0 but I am yet to reproduce to make sure.    Also should not they auto-die due to ControlPersist=15m or that happens only if someone tries to use that (well I ran `ssh -o ControlMaster=auto -o ControlPersist=15m -o ControlPath=/home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/b0da704a datasets.datalad.org uname` and nothing changed in the list above)? (you can see they they are running already for 2 days)

I consider it of important severity since it could be considered of a security hazard.
